text: Excellent, cosy, quaint restaurant. Great food at reasonable prices. Take it from an Italian, tastes just like home!

Little hole in the wall restaurant serving great Italian dishes.
The mushrooms are delicious. Thin style pizza. 
Tortellini was good.
Friendly service and Id come back.

Little family owned restaurant serving simple but  yummy Italian dishes.
The polenta and wild mushrooms are delicious. A must have.
The pizza is thin and tasty. 
Also had the Tortellini a la Gigi, which was good, but wished the tortellini were fresh.
All in all, really good food in this little quaint restaurant, with friendly service.
